contraindications: History of angioedema with ACE inhibitors
interactions: NSAIDs may reduce efficacy, Potassium supplements increase hyperkalemia risk

side_effects: Nausea, Diarrhea, Abdominal discomfort, Metallic taste
interactions: Alcohol increases lactic acidosis risk, Iodinated contrast may cause renal failure

indications: Bacterial infections (respiratory, ear, urinary tract, skin)
contraindications: Penicillin allergy, History of severe hypersensitivity
interactions: Probenecid increases amoxicillin levels, May reduce effectiveness of oral contraceptives
